mdRecord.dcterms:description: mansion designed by Carrere and Hastings and built 1907-1910. Gardens considered by some to be "the finest example in North America of a formal French garden..." -- http://www.architecturaldigest.com/decor/2010-03/return_of_nemours_article [work]
